"Dino": "My Shop is the virtual marketplace that ARKS use to buy and sell items among each other."
"Pretty much everyone relies on it, whether it be to find an item they're looking for, or to sell stuff that they don't need."
"There's so many items to browse that it can be fun just to drool at all the awesome stuff people have listed."

"I once actually spent almost a full day just browsing items.
...Yeah, I might have a problem."
"Anyways, why don't you go check it out? I guarantee you won't be disappointed!"
"Why not check out the shops? You might find something interesting!"
